description: This file defines a Python class 'CalComTools' that provides an interface to interact with the Cal.com scheduling API. It includes methods for fetching available slots, creating, rescheduling, and canceling bookings, as well as retrieving upcoming bookings. The class handles environment variables for configuration, timezone conversions, and API request headers.

classes.name: CalComTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Cal.com API, supporting booking management and slot retrieval.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the CalComTools class with API credentials, timezone, and feature toggles.

methods.name: _convert_to_user_timezone
methods.description: Converts UTC time string to user's local timezone formatted string.

methods.name: _get_headers
methods.description: Generates headers for API requests, including authorization and API version.

methods.name: get_available_slots
methods.description: Fetches available time slots within a date range from Cal.com API.

methods.name: create_booking
methods.description: Creates a new booking with specified start time, attendee name, and email.

methods.name: get_upcoming_bookings
methods.description: Retrieves upcoming bookings for an attendee, optionally filtered by email.

methods.name: reschedule_booking
methods.description: Reschedules an existing booking to a new start time with a reason.

methods.name: cancel_booking
methods.description: Cancels an existing booking with a provided reason.
